sentences.sContent: The allure and charm of Paris captivate all who visit there.
sentences.sContent_eng: The allure and charm of Paris captivate all who visit there.
sentences.sCn: 巴黎的诱惑与魅力吸引了所有到此游玩的人。

sentences.sContent: The allure and charm of Paris captivate all who visit there.
sentences.sContent_eng: The allure and charm of Paris captivate all who visit there.
sentences.sCn: 它的诱惑与魅力吸引了所有到那游玩的人。

words.tran: 诱惑的，诱人的；迷人的，吸引人的
